issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
I installed Titanium Studio (VERSION 1.0.4.201108101535 - BUILD 201108101535), but immediately after splash screen it crashes.
I can just select the worspace, and then it report an error.

I am attacching the Apple CrashReport and log stored on .metadata folder.

Below you can find the titaniumstudio.ini (it contains default values)

-startup
../../../plugins/org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.1.1.R36x_v20101122_1400.jar
--launcher.XXMaxPermSize
256m
--launcher.defaultAction
openFile
-vmargs
-Xms40m
-Xmx1024m
-Declipse.p2.unsignedPolicy=allow
-Declipse.log.size.max=10000
-Declipse.log.backup.max=5
-Xdock:icon=../Resources/titanium.icns
-XstartOnFirstThread
-Dorg.eclipse.swt.internal.carbon.smallFonts


Java version is:

java version "1.6.0_26"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0_26-b03-383-11A511)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 20.1-b02-383, mixed mode)



Could you help me? I found a lot of discussion didn't help me to solve this issue.

I already tried to uninstall and reinstall Titanium Studio.

Thanks!
fields.summary: Mac OSX Lion Titanium Studio crash immediately after splash screen
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.7.2

java version "1.6.0_26"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0_26-b03-383-11A511)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 20.1-b02-383, mixed mode)

comments.body:
- I don't use any proxy / firewall, I have a direct internet connection.
- Titanium Stop crashes before to ask the login credential
Yes, I tried download and reinstall 3 times.

Hi,
How can i reope this issue? I have seen the the status CLOSE, but the issue is open, because Titanium crashes also after new 2 downloading from different server.
I am finding on google a lot of similar problems.
Thanks

Davide,

Would you please try downloading and installing yesterdays 1.0.6 release to see if that helps? Otherwise, the log file error is talking about a security configuration issue (which relates to the storage of the password). perhaps there is something about how you system is configured. THis might be a bug, and might not...but that would be the next step to check.

Closing due to inactivity. If this issue still exists, please raise a new ticket, including all the information in the [JIRA Ticket Checklist|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-JIRATicketChecklist] to ensure that we can escalate it quickly. Read [How to Submit a Bug Report|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report] if you have not read it before, and always start a ticket using the [JIRA Ticket Template|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/JIRA+Ticket+Template].

Thanks in advance
